# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-15, -50)
- Burner mining drill mining iron ore at (-15, -50)
- Connected to wooden chest at (-14.5, -48.5) storing iron ore
- Stone furnace at (-14, -47) smelting iron plates

### Iron Smelting Array
- Stone furnace at (0, 0) processing iron ore
- Stone furnace at (4, 4) processing iron ore
- Stone furnace at (6, 4) processing iron ore

### Copper Processing
- Stone furnace at (2, 0) smelting copper plates

### Automation Science Pack Production at (24.5, 4.5)
- Assembling machine at (24.5, 4.5)
- Input chest at (21.5, 4.5)
- Output chest at (27.5, 4.5) containing 70 science packs
- Two burner inserters:
  - At (22.5, 4.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
  - At (26.5, 4.5) moving items from assembler to output chest
- Connected to electrical network via multiple small electric poles

### Power Generation System
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) extracting water
- Boiler at (-2.0, 23.5) heating water
- Steam engine at (9.5, 19.5) generating power
- Connected via two pipe networks:
  - Water network (System 39081)
  - Steam network (System 39079)
- Connected to electrical grid powering the automation science pack assembly

# ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Keep coal reserves above minimum threshold to prevent "out of fuel" errors
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices (mining drills, inserters, boilers)

### Resource Supply Issues
- Ensure copper ore is available before attempting to insert into furnaces
- Monitor ore reserves and mine more when running low

### Power System Connection Issues
- Ensure proper pipe connections between offshore pump, boiler and steam engine
- Verify steam engine is connected to power network via electric poles
- Check pipe layouts when steam engine shows "not connected" status

### Inventory Management
- Track inventory levels of critical resources (coal, ores)
- Plan mining operations to maintain steady resource supply
